l:dependency.name: Zephyr for JIRA Test Management plugin
l:dependency.l:description: Sychronizes tests and update their execution status for tests in ZephyrForJira (Server and Datacenter)

l:dependency.name: JSON in Java
l:dependency.l:description:
JSON is a light-weight, language independent, data interchange format. See http://www.JSON.org/
The files in this package implement JSON encoders/decoders in Java. It also includes the capability to convert between JSON and XML, HTTP headers, Cookies, and CDL.
This is a reference implementation. There is a large number of JSON packages in Java. Perhaps someday the Java community will standardize on one. Until then, choose carefully.
The license includes this restriction: "The software shall be used for good, not evil." If your conscience cannot live with that, then choose a different package.
The package compiles on Java 1.2 thru Java 1.4.

l:dependency.name: Commons Logging
l:dependency.l:description: Commons Logging is a thin adapter allowing configurable bridging to other, well known logging systems.

l:dependency.name: Commons Codec
l:dependency.l:description: The codec package contains simple encoder and decoders for various formats such as Base64 and Hexadecimal. In addition to these widely used encoders and decoders, the codec package also maintains a collection of phonetic encoding utilities.
